mc.question: What is the main role of CSS in web development?
choices: To structure the layout of an app
To style and beautify web content

mc.question: Which of the following is NOT a stage in the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC)?
Why do developers use GitHub?
choices: To collaborate and manage code changes

mc.question: What is one benefit of version control in app development?
choices: It reduces the app file size
It keeps track of code changes and helps with collaboration

mc.question: What is JavaScript primarily used for in web apps?
Which of the following is an example of JavaScript in action on a webpage?
choices: Changing the background color when a button is clicked
Setting the page font using CSS
Defining the page layout with HTML

mc.question: In Design Thinking, what is the purpose of the 'Empathize' stage?
choices: Understand the users' needs and problems

mc.question: What does API stand for?
What is the main function of an API in app development?
choices: Connecting apps to external services or data sources

mc.question: What is 'User-Centric Development'?
choices: Designing the app for business investors
Creating apps that are built around user needs and experiences
Ignoring user feedback until the end

mc.question: Which of the following is an example of Data Input in an app?
choices: A user typing their name into a form

mc.question: What is a common data format used when processing API responses in JavaScript?

choices: Machines that can simulate human thinking and learning
A storage method for HTML content

mc.question: What is one key reason to learn Business Development during app creation?
choices: To help market, fund, and grow your app idea

mc.question: Why is user testing essential during app development?
choices: To ensure the color scheme is attractive
